item.title: 【BLU-RAY】BLU-RAY - Joe Satriani - Satchurated Live in Montreal 2-3D (2010) Blu-ray
item.description:
Joe Satriani - Satchurated Live in Montreal 2-3D (2010) Blu-ray


Genre: Rock
Quality: Blu-ray 3D
Video: MPEG-4 AVC Video / 1920x1080p, 23,976 fps, ~12181 Kbps
Audio: #1 English / LPCM 2.0 48 kHz / 2304 kbps / 24-bit
Audio: #2 English / Dolby Digital Audio 5.1 48 kHz / 448 kbps
Audio: #3 English / Dolby TrueHD Audio 7.1 96 kHz / 7505 kbps / 16-bit
Size: 38.45 GB
Time: 02:19:43

Tracklist

World-famous guitarist Joe Satriani is featured in Satchurated: Live in Montreal, the concert movie from award-winning directors and producers Pierre and Francois Lamoureux, coming to select theaters nationwide on March 1, 2012. Satchurated is the first concert film ever to be released in 3D and Dolby Surround 7.1.
Satchurated was filmed live on the Wormhole Tour in support of Satriani's new album, Black Swans and Wormhole Wizards, at the Metropolis in Montreal, Canada, on December 12, 2010. Eight cameras captured the sold-out concert in both 2D and 3D. Satriani is among the few artists in history to release a 3D concert film. He is a leading force in rock music, having been voted the No. 6 All-Time Best Guitarist by Guitarist Magazine (UK) and Best Guitarist of the Year three times by Guitar World Magazine. In his career, Satriani has sold more than 10 million copies of his studio and live recordings worldwide, has been nominated for 15 Grammy Awards®, and has sold more than 4 million concert tickets.
